events.name: Burlington Winter Festival
events.summary: Annual winter festival on the waterfront. Ice sculptures, food vendors, live music, and family activities.
events.whySteven: Walking distance from downtown. Good food vendors. Outdoor winter activity that's actually fun.

events.name: Toronto Light Festival
events.summary: Light art installations throughout the Distillery District. Magical winter evening walk.
events.whySteven: Unique date night or solo exploration. Great photos. Free.

events.name: Winterlicious Toronto
events.summary: Toronto's restaurant week. Prix fixe menus at top restaurants across the city.
events.whySteven: Try high-end restaurants at accessible prices. Good excuse for a Toronto day trip.

winter: Skiing at Glen Eden / Blue Mountain (1-2hr drive)
Winterlicious Toronto (Jan-Feb) — prix fixe at top restaurants
Toronto Light Festival at Distillery District
Indoor climbing at Burlington's Gravity Climbing Gym
Cozy restaurant evenings — perfect time for steakhouse dinners
spring: Cherry blossoms at High Park Toronto (late April-May)
Maple syrup festivals at local farms (March)
First patio days of the year
summer: Burlington Ribfest (Aug-Sep) — huge waterfront BBQ festival
Outdoor concerts at Spencer Smith Park
Niagara wine tours in peak season
fall: Apple picking at Chudleigh's or nearby farms
Halloween events at Screemers / Canada's Wonderland
